ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue:
"Thrillkill, Part IV: Last Rights" by Mark WinfreyA death squad is sent to kill the Curator, but he proves to much for them. The attack is enough to convince him to join Laana's cause."Gideon's Price: A Tale from the Aniverse" by Randy Zimmerman and Jason MooreGideon runs a curio shop where the rare is on sale, and everything has its price if you only dare ask. Some escaped prisoners are pursued into the shop, and one pleads with Gideon for a place to hide. He should have asked the price before he made the deal."Fugitive: Mayberry R.I.P." by Charles Marshall, Greg Cravens, Rich Herold and Bryan AndrewsPrison escapee Raisch has Detective Clarence Delaney hot on his heels, through the weird world to TV programs into which Raisch was unexplainable plunged. Mayberry RFD is the locale this time, and Police Officer Barney Fife has collared Raisch while Andy is off fishing with Opie. Soon, the bodies are piled high, and Andy Taylor takes on an uncharacteristically vengeful tone."Baker Street: Honor Among Punks Overture" by Guy DavisA college student studying abroad in England finds herself immersed in Punk culture and worst...pit fights, drugs, and death in the basement of secret, illegal clubs."Eyes of the Hero..." by Chester Jacques, John Dennis, Dirk Johnston and Randy ZimmermanA P.O.V. adventure through the eyes of a hero, busting up an art heist."Heart of Darkness: The Saga of Cuda, Chapter 4" by Tim Vigil, Tim Tyler and PaganIn the darkness of the maze, Cuda is attacked by a warrior woman who assumes he is a pawn of Arson. He disarms the woman, Jinix by name, and forms an alliance. They fight their way further into the maze before coming upon a grotesque form, shackled to walls of a cell.

ComicInfo.Inker: Guy Davis,Jason Moore,Mark Winfrey,Randy Zimmerman,Tim Tyler,Tim Vigil
